title: Isis-knot Amulet
description:
“Tyt” – amulet of dark green-blue glazed faience. The space enclosed by the upper loop is solid, and the two other loops hand in a horizontal position. The piece has a flat-topped back pillar which is pierced for suspension. The various parts are slightly modeled.
Condition: Numerous dark stains; otherwise good.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
